title: Darkstream: media and meme magic
author: VD
content_html: Tonight’s Darkstream delved into the history of GamerGate, the weaponization of the meme and why memes are particularly effective in defanging the media’s institutional high ground.
content_text:
Tonight’s Darkstream delved into the history of GamerGate,
the weaponization of the meme
and why memes are particularly effective in defanging the media’s institutional high ground.
